title: Pieters wins Czech Masters for 1st European Tour victory
short_headline: Pieters wins Czech Masters for 1st European Tour victory
page_title: Pieters wins Czech Masters for 1st European Tour victory
headline: Pieters wins Czech Masters for 1st European Tour victory
body:
VYSOKY UJEZD, Czech Republic (AP) Thomas Pieters shot a 3-under 69 on Sunday to win the Czech Masters by three strokes for his first European Tour victory.

Pieters overcame a bad start with a double bogey on the third hole by making four birdies the rest of the way to hold off Pelle Edberg of Sweden. The 23-year-old Belgian finished with a 20-under 268 at the Albatross Golf course near Prague.

Edberg shot a 71 after mixing three birdies with two bogeys, with Matthew Fitzpatrick of England another shot back after a 68.
